messages: Hi! I'm OG Assist. How can I help today?
You got it — I’m on it.
All set. Want me to do anything else?
Tip: Use ‘View Latest’ to refresh the document.
I can open Word for you or save progress here.
Noted. I’ll keep an eye on changes.
Heads up: you can compile a packet from the right pane.
Let me know when to notify approvers.
